description: Maintains historical versions of complete QAQC datasets for version control, data recovery, and longitudinal analysis. Preserves full water quality records with comprehensive quality flags and metadata.
purpose: Provide version control and backup for complete processed datasets while enabling historical analysis

archival_strategy.retention_policy: maintain 3 most recent complete dataset versions
archival_strategy.rotation: oldest versions automatically removed when count exceeds 3
archival_strategy.backup_frequency: after each successful QAQC pipeline execution

dataset_characteristics.temporal_coverage: complete historical record from network deployment
dataset_characteristics.spatial_coverage: all active monitoring sites in Poudre Water Quality Network

file_naming.timestamp_format: ISO 8601 UTC timestamp of processing completion

version_control.rollback: allows reverting to previous dataset versions if needed
version_control.audit_trail: maintains record of all dataset generations
version_control.change_tracking: timestamps enable tracking of data evolution

data_integrity.validation: each archived version validated before storage
data_integrity.checksums: file integrity verification through parquet metadata
data_integrity.redundancy: multiple archive copies ensure data preservation

access_patterns.read_frequency: occasional for historical analysis or data recovery

use_cases.description: restore previous dataset version if current processing has issues
compare data processing improvements over time
verify consistency of reprocessed historical data
evaluate impact of QAQC algorithm changes

storage_management.size_optimization: duplicate data minimized through efficient encoding
storage_management.growth_estimation: archive size grows with network expansion and time

metadata_preservation.processing_parameters: QAQC settings preserved with each version
metadata_preservation.data_lineage: connection to source raw data maintained

recovery_procedures.restoration: copy archived version to main Curated folder
recovery_procedures.validation: verify restored data integrity and completeness
recovery_procedures.documentation: log recovery actions for audit purposes
